p: A total of 2,868 articles were included, 2,156 (75.1%) and 712 (24.8%) had research focus in the Russian Federation and countries of the former Soviet Union, respectively. Of the 2,156 articles originating from the Russia, 713 (33.9%) had no clear location of the research focus. They were categorized as originating either from “Russia—ALL,” indicating that there was more than one federal district included (177, 7.2%), or “Russia—UNKNOWN,” indicating that no specific city or federal district was included (554, 25.7%) ( Table 1 and Figure 1).
